page.title: 12Jobs in Dovercourt- on land
page.content: There are many jobs connected with the docks of Parkeston and Harwich which are primarily land-based. Some people live in Dovercourt because their job has brought them to the area. This is usually the case with Customs Officers who are transferred from time to time from one port to another. The Customs are kept busy handling tourists and goods such as cars being imported and exported to and from this country. Apart from dockers' work _ loading and unloading ships - there are jobs for lorry drivers and crane operators. Clerical workers are also needed to handle the paperwork arising from shipments of goods.
